title: Turkish competition board fines Meta Platforms $18.6 million
text: Turkey's competition authority said on Wednesday that it had fined Facebook-parent Meta Platforms Inc 346.72 million lira ($18.63 million) for violating competition law.

title: Can Meta Stock Get Its Mojo Back with Q3 Earnings?
text: Trading 61% from its highs, investors will be closely watching Meta Platforms (META) Q3 earnings release on October 26. Shareholders have pointed out META significantly underperforming the Nasdaq and are calling for the company to focus on its core business Facebook.

title: Meta: Asymmetric Upside With Multiple Catalysts
text: We think the market has begun to appreciate the staying power of the Facebook family of Apps and consistent and steady longer-term growth with the overall digital advertising market. Aggressive cost cuts are enhancing the overall efficiency and margin profile of the business—likely in the form of a total headcount reduction in the 10-20% range.

title: Why Meta Platforms Shares Are Rising - Meta Platforms (NASDAQ:META)
text: Meta Platforms Inc (NASDAQ: META) shares are trading higher by 6.21% to $137.77 going into the close of Tuesday's session. Shares of several companies in the broader tech sector at large are trading higher amid overall market strength as investors react to quarterly earnings reports from U.S.

title: Will Lower Ad Revenues Hurt Meta Platforms (META) Q3 Earnings?
text: Meta Platforms (META) third-quarter 2022 earnings are expected to have been affected by ad revenue business slowdown and global macro-economic condition.

title: This stock is likely to outperform Tesla, just like Chevron stock has beaten Meta Platforms
text: Stock valuations matter. Just ask investors in Meta Platforms META, +4.51%.

title: JPMorgan Chase merchants can now receive payments through Meta Pay
text: JPMorgan Chase & Co's network of merchants will now be able to offer customers an option to make payments through Meta Pay, a top company executive at Meta Platforms Inc said on Tuesday.

title: Why Meta Platforms Stock Was Rising Earlier Today
text: Investors are hopeful that the social media giant is navigating through the worst right now.

title: Big Tech earnings in focus: investors hope that heavy hitters Meta, Amazon and Alphabet buck trend of disappointing 3Q results
text: Big Tech earnings season is now in full swing and investors are hoping names like Meta, Amazon and Alphabet will buck the trend of disappointing third quarter results from their Wall Street counterparts. Google owner Alphabet is due to report on Tuesday after the bell, followed by Facebook parent company Meta on Wednesday and Amazon on Thursday, along with Apple Inc (NASDAQ:AAPL).

title: Big Tech earnings in focus as investors hope that heavy hitters Meta, Amazon and Alphabet buck trend of disappointing 3Q results
text: Big Tech earnings season is now in full swing and investors are hoping names like Meta, Amazon and Alphabet will buck the trend of disappointing third quarter results from their Wall Street counterparts. Google owner Alphabet is due to report on Tuesday after the bell, followed by Facebook parent company Meta on Wednesday and Amazon on Thursday, along with Apple Inc (NASDAQ:AAPL).

title: Meta: Valuation Finally Looks Compelling Even Without The Metaverse
text: Meta Platforms has never been cheaper on NTM EV/EBITDA. META generates tons of cash for continued stock buybacks and perhaps a dividend.

title: The CMA Just Ordered Meta to Sell Giphy. How Will This Impact Shareholders?
text: It remains to be seen if this sets a new precedent for big tech, but it's a notable decision worth watching.

title: Meta Investor Calls for Major Changes
text: The head of a technology-focused hedge fund called on Meta Platforms (META) to slash its workforce and pull back spending on its metaverse technology, saying it's time for the social media giant to “get fit.”

title: Meta Platforms: Getting Fit
text: Brad Gerstner issued a letter to Meta Platforms about getting financially fit primarily via a 20% reduction to costs. The social media company has a far better path to higher profits via constraining costs while not destabilizing the revenue growth plans.

title: Facebook's ad delivery algorithm is discriminating based on race, gender and age in photos, researchers find
text: Have you ever noticed the faces in Facebook ads seem to match your gender, race or age? That isn't an accident, Northeastern computer science researchers say.

title: Microsoft Stock News Roundup: Meta Microsoft Partnership, Microsoft Surface Event, Dividends
text: What's happening with Microsoft stock? Here's all the recent news that is already impacting Microsoft stock, with more to come.

title: Verdict on continuation of Meta's prosecution in Kenya to be made early next year
text: A ruling on whether or not Meta has a case to answer in Kenya will be made early next year, following legal submissions tabled today by attorneys representing the social media giant and plaintiff Daniel Motaung.

title: Meta falls after Whatsapp crashes for two-hours
text: Meta Platforms Inc (NASDAQ:FB) shares dipped in pre-market trading after WhatsApp went down for around two hours this morning. Users around the world had trouble sending and receiving messages, though the service is said to be back and up running again now.

title: WhatsApp suffers major outage
text: WhatsApp is suffering a serious service outage, preventing some users from sending messages on the platform.

title: WhatsApp outage: some users have connection restored
text: Popular messaging app WhatsApp was slowly coming back online by 0900 GMT on Tuesday, with some users in India, Asia and the United Kingdom saying they were able to send and receive some messages and videos.

title: Whatsapp Down In Widespread Outage
text: Whatsapp users across a number of countries have reported connectivity issues on the Meta-owned app.

title: WhatsApp outages reported around the world
text: LONDON (AP) — People around the world are reporting problems sending and receiving messages on the popular chat app WhatsApp.

title: WhatsApp outages also reported in France
text: Popular messaging service WhatsApp stopped working for many users across France on Tuesday, with around 9,540 problems registered in the last 24 hours about the Meta Platforms owned service on the Downdetector.fr French website.

title: WhatsApp is down for thousands of users, making it impossible to send and receive messages
text: WhatsApp was still down an hour after the outage began. Users in the UK, India, Asia, and parts of Europe were affected.

title: WhatsApp Users in Several Countries Report Disruptions
text: The app was down on Tuesday morning. WhatsApp said it was working to restore service as quickly as possible.

title: Meta-owned messaging service WhatsApp suffers global outage
text: WhatsApp, the messaging app owned by Facebook parent Meta, suffered a global outage on Tuesday.
